subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The talk was all about Marcell Ozuna after he made some spectacular throws in Friday’s game, but the Mets proved too much for the Marlins in Saturday’s 4-0 win.
snippet: The talk was all about Marcell Ozuna after he made some spectacular throws in Friday’s game, but the Mets proved too much for the Marlins in Saturday’s 4-0 win.
